issue.title: [C++] add support for UnionArrays to Take and Filter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5594). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Take and [Filter](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4366) kernels do not currently support UnionArrays, but this should not be difficult to add
